attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
since petrol prices are high can the p.m. explain,last year the price off petrol was near $150 a barrel and was costing us about £1.10 a litre.
then why do we still pay over a pound for petrol when its only $80 a barrel.the goverment forget we the public choose who will be p.m.of the country,yet we still get hit with high taxes. 
i'am on a low wage and find it hard to live many people have lost jobs, i'am lucky to have a job but do not earn high wages like mp's.
i would have like to have been an mp but never given the chance. i would make a good mp and help you run the country to the standed the british people want.
